lenders.name: j.hart
lenders.loan_because: I believe in freedom and capitalism, and want to be a good steward of all I've been blessed with.

lenders.name: liyana
lenders.occupational_info: My first part-time job was a kindergarten teacher. For two years I worked as a kindergarten teacher, there was not even a day that I did not feel nervous. Handling kids aged 2-6 years old in which they can be very demanding made me nervous. Plus, there are someone else’s child. Talking about responsibility? Beyond imagination. During my course of studying marketing, I worked part-time for various companies majorly event companies. Most of my job area would be in marketing communication and promotional events. Although I must say it’s challenging and fun, the only drawback is I have to work during the weekends. My first full-time job was with an advertising company as an Accounts Executive. My job was to find clients and pitch for clients to take up the company’s deal. It was not an easy job. Then, I moved to PETRONAS , Malaysia’s owned oil and gas company. I was working with the International Trading Corporation, under Supply, Operations and Logistics Department.  My work is to engage with clients buying chemical products from PETRONAS trading it to other major players within the oil and gas industry. Supplying to customers chemical product, handling vessel and trucking logistics ensuring products reach to the customers as promised. Sounds very complex? It’s not. Technically, I’m still working with PETRONAS as I took a year leave to fly myself to Melbourne and pursue MBA.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides an opportunities for people to better themselves and others.

lenders.name: Alfine
lenders.loan_because: of the satisfaction I get from knowing that I'm able to help someone in more need of money than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I do not only believe in love, nonjudgment, patience, generosity and other relative qualities, but I believe in BEING these things in order to DO things that reflect such beliefs.

lenders.occupational_info: i help clients make their events what they had envisioned, from the flavors to the decor

I must be a steward with the money God has blessed me with so that I can serve others as well.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: I'm thankful for my job, and am so happy to join a worldwide network of people making jobs for themselves possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in New York City, at a cooperatively run grocery store, owned by more than 15,000 working members.  We keep our prices very low because our members do most of the labor at our Coop (that keeps our expenses much lower than most stores).  In order to shop here, you must be a member and to be a member, you have to agree to work for 2.75 hours once every 4 weeks.  I am one of only 65 paid staff people and I help to coordinate the labor, answer member questions, I perform administrative jobs like process the payroll, and a lot of other information management.

As the business grew my mom was able to hire friends, family and neighbors to help with baking, sandwich assembly, food delivery, and more.  After seeing first-hand how a thriving small business spread wealth and opportunity to our community, I want to help other families make their business dreams a reality.

lenders.name: andre
lenders.loan_because: 1 year ago I started a business credit mobile phone ownership with capital loaned by a friend, 4 months running a successful business, been running 5 to start a business due to bad debts distracted from its consumers. now I am confused and a lot of debt to return the money that I borrow from a friend. I have been trying to sell my motorcycle, but less than sufficient funds to restore the money that I borrow from a friend. but I do not give up because I want to start a new business that is a distributor of rice, and I need a capital of Rp. 25,000,000, or approximately USD $ 2500 to start this business. I currently have 3 people brother who is still only school while my mother worked as a factory worker, while my father unemployment. I already 2 months this is not  worked and threatened the sack from work because of corporate efficiency. Now I hope there is a benefactor willing to give loans that will change the very meaning of life for my family and start a beautiful life.
lenders.occupational_info: For the rice distribution business that will I do, I already have a partner working in Klaten as rice, while my job is looking for buyers and deliver the order to the buyer until the rice. capital needed to rent a truck and operational, for a while, I will rent a truck and I hope that if the business is running smoothly within 1 year I can already buy their own trucks for this business

lenders.name: Miguel and Sandy
lenders.loan_because: One of life’s great classrooms is traveling to different cultures, learning, observing and always coming away fed beyond words!  Having traveled to many of the countries where Kiva is established, a consistent realization is that we all are more similar than we are different regardless of the miles between us. Giving back and lending a helping hand is one of the greatest pleasures in life. We are so thankful for all the help we have been given along life’s path and are so happy we are able to help others with their dreams!! Thank you Kiva for making this happen.

lenders.occupational_info: I design websites, print products, clothing and also do illustration. I also sew all of the clothing I design.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I beleive that Americans have a moral obligation to do what they personally can to help the world's poor
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest wine company in the world.  I lead a team focused on ensuring our people remain at the center of our business strategies and solutions

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I can and to help others change their lives

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a caregiver and educator for twin internationally adopted boys, whose parents have jobs that require they be away from their home for most of the day.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.occupational_info: I help to edit books about travel.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Mica
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student interested in international human rights, and development.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in the world, because even the smallest action can make a difference in many ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a University. In my job I help students and faculty members.

lenders.name: Maria & Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a small gesture on my part that could make a big difference to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a technical sales team that sells software to corporations.

lenders.name: wendy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.

lenders.name: Elly
lenders.loan_because: The modest amount I can afford to lend can still make a real difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Casino
lenders.occupational_info: We provide you with information about free online casinos giving gamblers free chips to play at the casinos.

lenders.name: Cheri Robertson
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people helping others to help themselves. I am very much against handouts - I will always give the man a fish if he's hungry, but then you must teach the man to fish so he can eat for a lifetime. Helping others to build themselves up is a win-win for everyone involved. I enjoy being able to loan to help those who wish to better themselves - they are brave people and I applaud them all.

lenders.name: Marie & Dustin
lenders.loan_because: I wish you happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people discover their own happiness.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.occupation: Test pilot in a flea powder factory.

lenders.name: ILONA
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteering for the Foundation for Sustainable Development in La Plata, Argentina http://www.fsdinternational.org/

lenders.name: Shazamlium
lenders.loan_because: It helps people!

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I believe that "To whom much is given, much is expected".  I am grateful for the opportunities I have had in my life to work hard and now I have a comfortable living.  It is time to pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a medical office.  I run the business so that we can keep our doors open and our doctors can see patients.

lenders.name: Samara
lenders.loan_because: I like to make people smile, and its the least I could do.
lenders.occupational_info: A little bit of everything: account mangement, accounting, facilities managment, human resources, events - the "organizer"

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: It seems like such a simple way for my children and I to make a difference. Choosing the entrepreneurs ourselves gives us a greater sense of involvement. Being able to track the progress of the entrepreneurs also makes the whole process gratifying in more ways than one.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a biomedical engineer studying parasites that cause diseases mostly affecting the underdeveloped regions of the world. I hope to contribute in some small part to finding a cure to one of these diseases.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I can and everyone who can, should.

lenders.name: Willemien
lenders.loan_because: I am glad to have the financial space to support women who can build up an independent existence
lenders.occupational_info: my job is to accompany little children ( 4 to 6 years old) to be happy playfull children

lenders.name: Vera
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone start their own business, so that they may provide for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the medical field in a business that helps patient's eyes to see better.

lenders.name: Ilgaz & Damla & Gokhan
lenders.loan_because: A micro-loan is the best way to give people in developing countries a chance to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: It is helpful to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I make candy to sell to stores and whoever wants to buy it, check out my website.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I am part of a girl scout troop, and we are doing this for our silver award. Also, it is a very creative way to give to charity, while getting what you give back.  It is better and more unique than the usual bake sale, coat drive, etc. I thought it was really cool.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed and would like to share my blessings with others.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: my material needs aren't as important as someone struggling to feed their children.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing my best to be a better person.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I am more than happy to help those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: quality assessment of other's work.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It is the way of the future

lenders.name: Uriel

lenders.occupational_info: fix helicopters

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone who is willing to work hard for their and their families future should be given the opportunity.

lenders.name: Jean & Scott
lenders.loan_because: We have some money that needs to be invested and there are others that know how use the  money for business ideas and services that benefit people in developing economies.
lenders.occupational_info: Jean is retired from teaching English while Scott works on projects to improve the electrical system in the Detroit, Michigan, USA area
